00010 b3FillCL::b3FillCL(cl_context ctx, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue)
00011 :m_commandQueue(queue)
00012 {
00013         const char* kernelSource = fillKernelsCL;
00014         cl_int pErrNum;
00015         const char* additionalMacros = "";
00016 
00017         cl_program fillProg = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, &pErrNum,additionalMacros, FILL_CL_PROGRAM_PATH);
00018         b3Assert(fillProg);
00019 
00020         m_fillIntKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, "FillIntKernel", &pErrNum, fillProg,additionalMacros );
00021         b3Assert(m_fillIntKernel);
00022 
00023         m_fillUnsignedIntKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, "FillUnsignedIntKernel", &pErrNum, fillProg,additionalMacros );
00024         b3Assert(m_fillIntKernel);
00025 
00026         m_fillFloatKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, "FillFloatKernel", &pErrNum, fillProg,additionalMacros );
00027         b3Assert(m_fillFloatKernel);
00028 
00029         
00030 
00031         m_fillKernelInt2 = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, "FillInt2Kernel", &pErrNum, fillProg,additionalMacros );
00032         b3Assert(m_fillKernelInt2);
00033         
00034 }
00035 
00036 b3FillCL::~b3FillCL()
00037 {
00038         clReleaseKernel(m_fillKernelInt2);
00039         clReleaseKernel(m_fillIntKernel);
00040         clReleaseKernel(m_fillUnsignedIntKernel);
00041         clReleaseKernel(m_fillFloatKernel);
00042 
00043 }

00045 void b3FillCL::execute(b3OpenCLArray<float>& src, const float value, int n, int offset)
00046 {
00047         b3Assert( n>0 );
00048 
00049         {
00050                 b3LauncherCL launcher( m_commandQueue, m_fillFloatKernel,"m_fillFloatKernel" );
00051                 launcher.setBuffer( src.getBufferCL());
00052                 launcher.setConst( n );
00053                 launcher.setConst( value );
00054                 launcher.setConst( offset);
00055 
00056                 launcher.launch1D( n );
00057         }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void b3FillCL::execute(b3OpenCLArray<int>& src, const int value, int n, int offset)
00061 {
00062         b3Assert( n>0 );
00063         
00064 
00065         {
00066                 b3LauncherCL launcher( m_commandQueue, m_fillIntKernel ,"m_fillIntKernel");
00067                 launcher.setBuffer(src.getBufferCL());
00068                 launcher.setConst( n);
00069                 launcher.setConst( value);
00070                 launcher.setConst( offset);
00071                 launcher.launch1D( n );
00072         }

00075 
00076 void b3FillCL::execute(b3OpenCLArray<unsigned int>& src, const unsigned int value, int n, int offset)
00077 {
00078         b3Assert( n>0 );
00079 
00080         {
00081                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { b3BufferInfoCL( src.getBufferCL() ) };
00082 
00083                 b3LauncherCL launcher( m_commandQueue, m_fillUnsignedIntKernel,"m_fillUnsignedIntKernel" );
00084                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00085                 launcher.setConst( n );
00086         launcher.setConst(value);
00087                 launcher.setConst(offset);
00088 
00089                 launcher.launch1D( n );
00090         }
00091 }

00093 void b3FillCL::executeHost(b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int2> &src, const b3Int2 &value, int n, int offset)
00094 {
00095         for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
00096         {
00097                 src[i+offset]=value;
